Content: Troops of the 11 (Volunteer) Gajaba Regiment (GR) and 7 Sri Lanka National Guard of the 651 and 652 Brigades under the 65 Division of the Security Force Headquarters-Kilinochchi on the directions of the General Officer Commanding 65 Division, Major General Wasantha Kumarapperuma and under the close supervision of  the 651 and 652 Brigade Commanders conducted Shramadana campaigns at Kariyalanagapadduwan Don Bosco Vocational Center premises and Arogyapuram Vishnu Kovil area on Monday (8) as community projects in the areas. A group of 20 troops and 12 civilians in the area contributed to the project.
